"Indian benchmark indices Sensex and Nifty opened over 1% higher, fueled by gains in banking and IT stocks. This rise follows positive global trends and easing U.S. recession fears. "Suzlon Energy's shares increased by 5% following the board's approval to acquire a 76% stake in Renom Energy Services for Rs 660 crore. The acquisition will be done in multiple stages.
